title: HELP plsss
body: guys i want to transfer my lol to philippine region how can i do that?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, this is not possible. Because [Garena](https://lol.garena.ph/) operates and supports League on the Phillippines region, it's not possible to transfer an account over to their region from a region operated by Riot. 

You can find the full rundown on how account transfers work on our [FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ) Let me know if you have any other questions.
